location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 61: Roger Orford, to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire, or William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: Roger Orford provides intelligence on the movement of French ships in the Gulf near Carrack [Bandar-e ChƒÅrak]. Orford states that, due to a hard easterly gale and a great swell, he can hardly write and that he hopes his message will be legible.
